meta.title: Vox Obscura | Voice Over Artist
meta.description: Fresh voice over talent specializing in narration, ads, and voice overs with a dark fantasy aesthetic.

hero.title: VOX OBSCURA
hero.subtitle: Voice Over Artist • Narrator • Ad Specialist

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a fresh voice in the industry with a passion for bringing stories and messages to life. While I may be new to professional voice overs, I bring boundless enthusiasm, a unique sound, and a dedication to delivering exactly what you need.

fresh.label: New Perspective
fresh.description: Bringing a contemporary sound and innovative approach to every project

turnaround.label: Quick Turnaround
turnaround.description: Fast delivery without compromising on quality

rates.label: Competitive Rates
rates.description: Professional quality without the premium price tag

voiceSamples.title: Voice Samples
voiceSamples.description: Listen to selections from my portfolio showcasing the range and depth of my vocal performances.

funFacts.title: Fun Facts & Quirks
funFacts.description: Get to know the person behind the microphone. Here are some tidbits about me and my voice over journey.

chameleon.title: Voice Chameleon
chameleon.description: I can switch between sultry narrator, energetic announcer, and calm explainer in seconds!

powered.title: Powered By
powered.description: Two cups of tea, one chocolate bar, and an unhealthy obsession with voice training videos.

record.title: Record Time
record.description: My fastest turnaround was 3 hours for a 2-minute commercial. The client needed it yesterday!

studio.title: Studio Setup
studio.description: My recording booth was built with moving blankets and PVC pipes. It's not pretty, but it sounds great!

tongue.title: Tongue Twisters
tongue.description: I practice with 'The sixth sick sheikh's sixth sheep's sick' every morning. Still can't get it right.

why.title: Why Voice Overs?
why.description: I fell in love with voice acting after being told I had a 'radio voice' while ordering at a drive-thru.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: Interested in working together? Reach out to discuss your project and how I can bring your message to life with my voice.
